item.title: April add a quote by Dan Millman
item.description: "Wake up! If you knew for certain you had a terminal illness--if you had little time left to live--you would waste precious little of it! Well, I'm telling you...you do have a terminal illness: It's called birth. You don't have more than a few years left. No one does! So be happy now, without reason--or you will never be at all." -- Dan Millman

item.title: April add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "My schedule for today lists a six-hour self-accusatory depression." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: April add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "You will be required to do wrong no matter where you go. It is the basic condition of life, to be required to violate your own identity. At some time, every creature which lives must do so. It is the ultimate shadow, the defeat of creation; this is the curse at work, the curse that feeds on all life. Everywhere in the universe." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: April add a quote by Jhonen Vasquez
item.description: "Sometimes...you can cry until there's nothing wet in you. You can scream and curse to where your throat rebels and ruptures. You can pray, all you want, to whatever god you think will listen. And, still it makes no difference. It goes on, with no sign as to when it might release you. And you know that if it ever did relent...it would not be because it cared." -- Jhonen Vasquez

item.title: April add a quote by Jhonen Vasquez
item.description: "You are all zombie thigh-fat people brought into reanimation by some evil force of forceful evil!" -- Jhonen Vasquez

item.title: April add a quote by Jhonen Vasquez
item.description: "End this pathetic deception! I know you're hiding martians in your head!! Gimme them martians! I am going to put butter on them!! Martians!! Grrr!!" -- Jhonen Vasquez

item.title: April add a quote by Jhonen Vasquez
item.description: "Conspiracy!! And now employing juvenile mongoloid demon babies!! My famous chicken recipe will never be yours!! Grr! Woof!" -- Jhonen Vasquez

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "There is only one thing in the world worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Behind every exquisite thing that existed, there was something tragic." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Nowadays most people die of a sort of creeping common sense, and discover when it is too late that the only things one never regrets are one's mistakes." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The only way to get rid of temptation is to yield to it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "My dear boy, no woman is a genius. Women are a decorative sex. They never have anything to say, but they say it charmingly. Women represent the triumph of matter over mind, just as men represent the triumph of mind over morals." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "There was purification in punishment. Not 'Forgive us our sins,' but 'Smite us for our iniquities' should be the prayer of a man to a most just God." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "When one is in love, one always begins by deceiving one's self, and one always ends by deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Being natural is simply a pose, and the most irritating pose I know." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Nowadays people know the price of everything and the value of nothing." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Children begin by loving their parents; as they grow older they judge them; sometimes they forgive them." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Men marry because they are tired; women, because they are curious: both are disappointed." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Women love us for our defects. If we have enough of them, they will forgive us everything, even our intellects." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "When a woman marries again, it is because she detested her first husband. When a man marries again, it is because he adored his first wife. Women try their luck; men risk theirs." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You seem to forget that I am married, and the one charm of marriage is that it makes a life of deception absolutely necessary for both parties." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: April add a quote by Alfred Hitchcock
item.description: "Blondes make the best victims. They're like virgin snow that shows up the bloody footprints." -- Alfred Hitchcock

item.title: April add a quote by Jacqueline Carey
item.description: "That which yields is not always weak." -- Jacqueline Carey

item.title: April add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: April add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Sometimes being a bitch is all a woman's got to hold on to." -- Stephen King

item.title: April add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The man in black fled across the desert, and the gunslinger followed." -- Stephen King

item.title: April add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Go then, there are other worlds than these." -- Stephen King

item.title: April add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Your hair is winter fire January embers My heart burns there, too." -- Stephen King
